e41adf8f5755726f112d03c234b7f1dd.name: Hotfix 16.4.3 + Credit Reimbursement #2
e41adf8f5755726f112d03c234b7f1dd.fixes: Fixed the Explosive Demise Mod harming the player that has it equipped.

3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.3.0
3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.fixes: Fixed the Heartseeker Mod not working for Dagger Zaws in Conclave.

3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.1
3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.additions: Added proper localization to Stand United, Precision Munition, Thundermiter, Draining Gloom and Heartseeker Mods.

3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #4
3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.changes: Fixed a bug with the Conclave Mod Heartseeker not having its -50% Damage Block drawback.

3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.name: The Index Preview
3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.changes: Fixed a bug where melee magnetism of the Heartseeker Conclave mod was not being activated correctly.

3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.name: Update 17.4.0
3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.fixes:
Fixed the Heartseeker Mod not properly interacting with the Martial Magnetism Mod.
Fixed the Heartseeker Mod not functioning properly with ‘offhand’ attacks.

3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.name: Update 17.3.0
3d38148b2aab7b65dce7cdc9a9d45308.changes: Heartseeker Conclave Mod is now available from TeshinHeartseeker (Daggers only): Lock onto targets at close range with a melee weapon, but reduces blocking effectiveness.

64a2ae4d55e17aa18bf1d45952a7f83b.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
64a2ae4d55e17aa18bf1d45952a7f83b.changes: The Impenetrable Offense Conclave Mod has had its damage block reduced from 50% to 40%.

64a2ae4d55e17aa18bf1d45952a7f83b.name: Update 18.3
64a2ae4d55e17aa18bf1d45952a7f83b.changes: The Impenetrable Offense Conclave Mod has been changed to: At Max Energy, +50% Damage Block.

64a2ae4d55e17aa18bf1d45952a7f83b.name: Update 17.2.4
64a2ae4d55e17aa18bf1d45952a7f83b.changes: Reduced the amount of additional block percentage on Impenetrable Offense mod.

eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.2.1
eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.fixes: Fixed a bug with Martial Fury that made Power Rate a negative value

eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.name: The War Within: Update 19.2.0
eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.changes: Changed the Martial Fury Conclave Mod from 0.5 Power Rate to -50% Power Rate.

eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.name: The Index Preview
eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.changes: On Hit condition and -100% Channeling Efficiency removed from Conclave Mod Martial Fury and replaced with .5 Power Rate.

eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 4
eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.fixes: Decreased channeling efficiency trade off added to Martial Fury.

eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.changes: With melee equipped and On Kill, +20% attack speed for 10 seconds (can stack with Martial Fury).

eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.name: Update 17.10.0
eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.changes: Martial Fury Mod attack speed boost duration boosted from 4 to 20 seconds.

eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.name: Update 17.8.0
eae124a78516e0ef9830dfce14598913.changes: The Martial Magnetism Mod is now called Martial Fury, and its effects now read: With a melee equipped attack speed increases 20% on hit for 3 seconds.

1770d9cf1b35dc87a7c7d168e09f4030.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #4
1770d9cf1b35dc87a7c7d168e09f4030.changes: Updated Mortal Conduct Conclave Mod description to accurately represent new Low Health value.

1770d9cf1b35dc87a7c7d168e09f4030.name: Update 18.3
1770d9cf1b35dc87a7c7d168e09f4030.changes: The Mortal Conduct Conclave Mod has been changed to: At Low Health, +60% Channeled Damage Reflection for 8 seconds.

1770d9cf1b35dc87a7c7d168e09f4030.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
1770d9cf1b35dc87a7c7d168e09f4030.changes: Fixed the Mortal Conduct Mod decreasing Channeling Efficiency at low health, instead of Increasing it.

7a06214782524faf850a19fc14013e17.name: The Silver Grove
7a06214782524faf850a19fc14013e17.changes: Relentless Assault mod now increases Power Rate instead of Attack Speed on Kill

7a06214782524faf850a19fc14013e17.name: Update 17.8.0
7a06214782524faf850a19fc14013e17.changes: The Relentless Assault Mod has been removed from Conclave.

b7d512c1f73fb66f59715965906d7bfb.name: Buried Debts: Hotfix 24.4.2
b7d512c1f73fb66f59715965906d7bfb.changes: Tenno, thank you kindly for your feedback, videos, and reactions so far on last night's Melee changes! We've been live for less than 24 hour with Phase 1 and we're going to start experimenting a little bit with some feedback. Our first experiment has to do with players who are truly committed to 'The Sword Alone'.

b7d512c1f73fb66f59715965906d7bfb.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
b7d512c1f73fb66f59715965906d7bfb.changes: In-mission challenges that require killing with a weapon will no longer appear if you can't actually complete them (Sword Alone mode, etc).
